name: Fozwot
description:
Retro style Indie game with a beautiful art style!

Fozwot, the Queen's clumsy butler, is the last hope to retrieve her stolen eggs from this dark and treacherous nest!

Tilt and swerve him through this stunningly crafted gothic world, avoiding perilous traps, targeting freaky enemies with a whack of the ball or spinning a web to trap and eat them!


- Beautiful, painterly art style
- Inventive, fresh gameplay mechanics
- Weird and wacky creatures challenge your reactions and tactics
- Intuitive, natural tilt and touch controls with dynamic animations
- 25 quirky and increasingly challenging levels with treats and power-ups
- Comic sound effects play over your own music
- Created from scratch to fit naturally on the iPhone and iPod touch
- Easy to play, difficult to master. Develop your own playing style!



GAMEPLAY

You play Fozwot, a punky caterpillar like creature. As you tilt your iPhone or iPod touch, he dynamically twists, turns, stretches and spins around. He moves so fluidly that it feels like he's really in your hand!

You'll need to help him get the Queens eggs back from the thief's wicked nest, and they're not going to give them up easily! Aside from the numerous traps, you'll encounter various species of stinging wasps, mad clowns, tickling bats, chopping birds and many more, all with their own quirky behaviors.

Fozwot, of course has some tricks at his disposal!


* SPIN A WEB
With a tap of the screen, watch as he knits an intricate web of a thousand strands! ..ready and waiting for on-coming bugs to get trapped and tangled in!


* WHACK THE BALL
The ball is Fozwots other weapon. Grab it, then tap on enemies to splat them with it instantly!

Only Fozwot and his Queen were left surviving after the raid, those stolen eggs were her last.. can you help?

Experience Fozwot for hours of rich and quirky gaming, all set within a stunning and unique world!


But be careful it's dark in there...
